member.name: T:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart
member.summary: Class NMathStatsChart provides static methods for plotting NMath Stats types using the Microsoft Chart Controls for .NET.

member.name: T:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction
member.summary: Enumeration for specifying the function to plot for a probability distribution.

member.name: F:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction.PDF
member.summary: Probability density function.

member.name: F:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction.CDF
member.summary: Cumulative distribution function.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn)
member.summary: Returns a line chart containing the given column data.
member.exception: Thrown if the given column is not numeric.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with the given column data.
member.exception: Thrown if the given column is not numeric.
member.remarks:
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
chart.Series[0] is replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.exception: Thrown if the given column is not numeric.
member.remarks:
Equivalent to:
NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( y ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn,CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathChart.Unit)
member.summary: Returns a line chart containing the given column data.
member.exception: Thrown if the given column is not numeric.

Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
chart.Series[0] is replaced, or added if necessary.

member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.exception: Thrown if the given column is not numeric.
member.remarks:
Equivalent to:
NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( y, xUnits ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn)
member.summary: Returns a new point (scatter) chart containing the given x-y data.
member.exception: Thrown if x and y have different lengths.
Thrown if either column is not numeric.

Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
chart.Series[0] is replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.exception: Thrown if x and y have different lengths.
Thrown if either column is not numeric.
member.remarks:

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn[])
member.summary: Returns a new line chart for the given columns.
member.remarks: Non-numeric columns are ignored.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn[])
member.summary: Updates the given chart with the given data.
member.remarks:
Non-numeric columns are ignored.
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
The first data.Length data series are replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.IDFColumn[])
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.remarks:

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.DataFrame,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new point chart for the specified columns of the given data frame (x, y) .
member.param: The index of the column containing the x data.
The index of the column containing the y data.
member.exception: Thrown if either column is not numeric.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.DataFrame,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with the columns of the given data frame.
member.param: The index of the column containing the x data.
The index of the column containing the y data.
member.exception: Thrown if either column is not numeric.
member.remarks:
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
chart.Series[0] is replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.DataFrame,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.param: The index of the column containing the x data.
The index of the column containing the y data.
member.exception: Thrown if either column is not numeric.
member.remarks:
Equivalent to:
NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( data, xColIndex, yColIndex ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.BetaDistribution,CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new line chart plotting the specified function of the given distribution for 0.0001 <= p <= 0.9999.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.BetaDistribution,CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with the specified distribution.
member.remarks:
Plots the specified function of the given distribution for 0.0001 <= p <= 0.9999.
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
chart.Series[0] is replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.BetaDistribution,CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.remarks:
Equivalent to:
NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( dist, function, numInterpolatedValues ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.BinomialDistribution,CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction)
member.summary: Returns a new line chart plotting the specified function of the given distribution for 0.0001 <= p <= 0.9999.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.BinomialDistribution,CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.DistributionFunction)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with the specified distribution.
member.remarks:
Plots the specified function of the given distribution for 0.0001 <= p <= 0.9999.
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
chart.Series[0] is replaced, or added if necessary.

member.remarks:

NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( dist, function ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.LinearRegression,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new line chart by interpolating over the given linear regression.
member.param: The predictor (independent) variable to plot on the x-axis.
member.exception: Thrown if the given predictorIndex is outside the range of columns in lr.PredictorMatrix.
member.remarks: The multidimensional linear regression fit is plotted projected onto the plane of the specified predictor variable.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.LinearRegression,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with the specified linear regression.
member.param: The predictor (independent) variable to plot on the x-axis.
member.exception: Thrown if the given predictorIndex is outside the range of columns in lr.PredictorMatrix.
member.remarks:
The multidimensional linear regression fit is plotted projected onto the plane of the specified predictor variable.
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
The first two data series are replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.LinearRegression,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.param: The predictor (independent) variable to plot on the x-axis.
member.exception: Thrown if the given predictorIndex is outside the range of columns in lr.PredictorMatrix.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.ClusterSet,CenterSpace.NMath.Core.DoubleMatrix,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new point chart plotting the given clusters.
member.param: A matrix of data. Each row in the matrix represents an object that was clustered.
The index of the matrix column containing the x data.
The index of the matrix column containing the y data.
member.exception: Thrown if either column index is outside the range of the columns of the given data matrix.
member.remarks:
Instances of class ClusterSet are created by ClusterAnalysis, KMeanClustering, and NMFClustering objects and cannot be constructed independently.
Objects are shown plotted in the specified x,y plane, colored according to their cluster assignment.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.ClusterSet,CenterSpace.NMath.Core.DoubleMatrix,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with the specified clusters.
member.param: A matrix of data. Each row in the matrix represents an object that was clustered.
The index of the matrix column containing the x data.
The index of the matrix column containing the y data.
member.exception: Thrown if either column index is outside the range of the columns of the given data matrix.
member.remarks:
Instances of class ClusterSet are created by ClusterAnalysis, KMeanClustering, and NMFClustering objects and cannot be constructed independently.
Objects are shown plotted in the specified x,y plane, and colored according to their cluster assignment.
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
The first clusters.NumberOfClusters data series are replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.ClusterSet,CenterSpace.NMath.Core.DoubleMatrix,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.param: A matrix of data. Each row in the matrix represents an object that was clustered.
The index of the matrix column containing the x data.
The index of the matrix column containing the y data.
member.exception: Thrown if either column index is outside the range of the columns of the given data matrix.
member.remarks:
Instances of class ClusterSet are created by ClusterAnalysis, KMeanClustering, and NMFClustering objects and cannot be constructed independently.
Objects are shown plotted in the specified x,y plane, colored according to their cluster assignment.
Equivalent to:
NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( clusters, data, xColIndex, yColIndex ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.FloatPCA)
member.summary: Returns a Scree chart for the given principal component analysis.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.FloatPCA)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with a Scree chart for the given principal component analysis.
member.remarks:
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
The first two data series are replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.FloatPCA)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.remarks:
Equivalent to:
NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( pca ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.FloatPCA,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a point (scatter) chart plotting the specified two principal components against one another.
member.param: The index of the principal component to use for the x values.
The index of the principal component to use for the y values.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.FloatPCA,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with a point (scatter) chart plotting the specified two principal components against one another.
member.param: The index of the principal component to use for the x values.
The index of the principal component to use for the y values.
member.remarks:
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
chart.Series[0] is replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.FloatPCA,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.param: The index of the principal component to use for the x values.
The index of the principal component to use for the y values.
member.remarks:
Equivalent to:
NMathStatsChart.Show( ToChart( pca, xIndex, yIndex ) );

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.ToChart(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.DoublePCA)
member.summary: Returns a Scree chart for the given principal component analysis.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Update(System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart@,CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.DoublePCA)
member.summary: Updates the given chart with a Scree chart for the given principal component analysis.
member.remarks:
A new, default ChartArea is added if one does not exist, otherwise chart.ChartAreas[0] is used. Axis titles, and DefaultAxisTitleFont and DefaultMajorGridLineColor, only have an effect if a new ChartArea is added.
Titles are added only if chart does not currently contain any titles.
The first two data series are replaced, or added if necessary.

member.name: M:CenterSpace.NMath.Charting.Microsoft.NMathStatsChart.Show(CenterSpace.NMath.Stats.DoublePCA)
member.summary: Shows a new chart in a default form.
member.remarks:
Equivalent to:
